How many people are affected by GM1 gangliosidosis ?,"GM1 gangliosidosis is estimated to occur in 1 in 100,000 to 200,000 newborns. Type I is reported more frequently than the other forms of this condition. Most individuals with type III are of Japanese descent.",GHR,GM1 gangliosidosis
What are the genetic changes related to GM1 gangliosidosis ?,"Mutations in the GLB1 gene
